images.copyright: A quarry in Diu (© LEROY Francis/hemis.fr/Getty Images)
images.title: Pockets of light in a quarry, Diu
images.caption: Pockets of light in a quarry, Diu
images.desc: Diu island stands just one hour away from Gujarat by flight. Although places like the Diu Fort or the Nagoa Beach are what are most frequently visited by tourists, the caves and quarries of Diu are a wonderful place to try some photography, simply because of the unusual play of light, like what you see on today’s homepage. A short walk from the main town, the Naida caves are well worth a visit. These are not natural caves; in fact they are abandoned Portuguese stone quarries.

tooltips.walle: ఈ చిత్రం వాల్‌పేపర్‌గా డౌన్‌లోడ్ చేయడానికి అందుబాటులో లేదు.
tooltips.walls: ఈ చిత్రాన్ని డౌన్‌లోడ్ చేయండి. ఈ చిత్రం వినియోగం వాల్‌పేపర్‌కి మాత్రమే పరిమితం చేయబడింది.
